title: Best of The Herd: 11/12/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 11/12/2018
description:
Colin thinks the Cowboys’ win over the Eagles could turn out to be a disaster because Dak proved once again he can only win if you give him the perfect formula. He isn't concerned about the Patriots despite their blowout loss to the Titans. He talks about where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Plus, Super Bowl Champion Greg Jennings talks about how Ezekiel Elliott is by far the most important player for the Cowboys. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
